resources.string:
qComicViewer 1.3.0

 Welcome to qComicViewer.

 	qComicViewer is meant to be a minimalist approach to other viewers on the market. Although, there are some great viewers out there, I wanted to provide something slightly different. 	I tried to make a solid reader that uses a very small amount of storage. Taking up only 60KB, this app is great for installing on an SD card. ZIP/CBZ/RAR/CBR compression support. So when youâ€™re scanning your comics, be sure to zip them! Image support includes JPG/JPEG, GIF, PNG and BMP.

 	Please feel free to contact me at nmquirk@gmail.com for any suggestions, comments or complaints.
